title: Torran
author: Torran
content: Hi guys, lately I've been interested in doing a master in cryptocurrency trading and I'm looking for a cheap and distance alternative, I saw a university called Tech but I don't know anything about them, do you have any experience studying at Tech or other information that could be useful to me apart from what is on their website. Thx!

comments.author: Anndress
comments.body: The university has a rigorous academic approach, commitment to cutting-edge research and educational excellence. I admire your ability to provide me as a student with an enriching learning experience and prepare me to face real-world challenges.

comments.author: Alexcooo
comments.body: I have been looking for an institution to broaden my knowledge for some time and in what I found they recommended this one, it seems to be a good one.

comments.author: Estebann33
comments.body: What's up Bro, this is a distance learning mode of study. They have good study material, surprisingly for an online education. It's designed for people who don't have time to reinforce their studies and it's interesting that you manage your learning time. I studied marketing and it was outstanding, it's a good alternative.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: For those who wants to learn about cryptocurrencies. What are you up to? Trading or just wanna learn its technicalities?Actually both of it can be found here and you just need to allot time in learning from here. Experts from both ends are willing to teach people that want to learn from them here.I know it's kinda of a shortcut when you try to learn from online universities or actual but you can learn more from here.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: Torran on September 25, 2023, 01:54:44 PMHi guys, lately I've been interested in doing a master in cryptocurrency trading and I'm looking for a cheap and distance alternative, I saw a university called Tech but I don't know anything about them, do you have any experience studying at Tech or other information that could be useful to me apart from what is on their website. Thx!If you are truly looking for cryptocurrency trading knowledge then why not hire a Mentor or Coach ? there have been plenty of them available Online that can mentor you one on one and can teach you everything you wanted to understand?or at least look for direct teaching buddies seems you are willing to pay like in universities , though hoping that you are not just making this thread to spam because there are 3 other account from your post that almost the same creation date as yours.

comments.author: coinsnapp7er
comments.body: I just enrolled myself into one of the technology technical categories. Although, as a novice, it seems like stepping into a labyrinth, with numerous possible career trajectories sprawling before you. But believe me, it's worth giving a try!
